movies.title: Gotti
movies.plot: John Gotti rises to the top of the New York underworld to become the boss of the Gambino crime family. His life takes a tumultuous turn as he faces tragedy, multiple trials and a prison sentence.

events.title: John Gotti helps in the killing of James McBratney
John Gotti becomes the new head of the Gambino family
John Gotti dies of cancer in prison

movies.title: Aftermath
movies.plot: A fatal plane crash changes the lives of Roman and Jake forever. Roman loses his wife and daughter in the accident, while Jake loses his mindâ€”as he happens to be the air traffic controller who failed to avert the nightmare. Rage and revenge engulfs Roman and Jake finds himself swamped with guilt and regret.
